title: RUBY Watch Face
developerAddress:

description: RUBY Watch Face, designed for Android Wear watches. Utilizing the latest Android Wear standard and API, the watch face delivers stunning style in smooth performance.- Beautifully rendered- Optimized smooth animation- Optional display of Date and Day of Week- Full color or simplified Ambient mode- For both round and square watches- Customizable Large or small peak card*Requires Android Wear 5.0+*After installation, please allow up to a minute for watch face to be available in Android Wear companion app.
descriptionHTML:
RUBY Watch Face, designed for Android Wear watches. Utilizing the latest Android Wear standard and API, the watch face delivers stunning style in smooth performance.

- Beautifully rendered

- Optimized smooth animation

- Optional display of Date and Day of Week

- Full color or simplified Ambient mode

- For both round and square watches

- Customizable Large or small peak card



*Requires Android Wear 5.0+

*After installation, please allow up to a minute for watch face to be available in Android Wear companion app.
